amendment.description: Amendment nominated Democratic candidates for Officers of the House.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to provide for the offering of the following as an alternative list of nominees to fill posts of Officers of the House: Tom O'Donnell as Clerk; George Kundanis as Sergeant at Arms; and Marti Thomas as Chief Administrative Officer.

action.text: Amendment (A001) offered by Mr. Fazio to the remainder of the resolution.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Fazio amendment (A001) Failed by voice vote.
